name: PowerMate Settings File
summary: A PMSETTINGS file is settings file used by PowerMate, an input device that plugs into a computer that can be rotated or pressed to perform computer functions. It contains settings for the PowerMate device, such as its dimmer attributes and assign functions. PMSETTINGS files can be exported and imported between different PowerMate devices for sharing purposes.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
